pages.text: The $(thing)bestiary tab$() is the monster collector's place to be! Every time you kill a creature, it will be added to the bestiary, with its stats and other information available. Collect them all!
pages.title: Bestiary Tab

pages.text: The tab will list out every available creature you have previously killed, along with a counter for the amount you have killed, as well as the number of times it has killed you.$(br2)Clicking on an entry expands it to a larger view with more detail, including the creature's classification, stats, and other relevant info. Some creatures may also have some lore text to read!
If you have a lot of creatures available in your $(thing)bestiary$() and want to look for a specific one, you can use the search bar at the top of the tab to narrow down the list.
